main.bio: i am an analyst at heart, with an entrepreneurial spirit, a knack for exploration, and a passion for solving problems,Having finished my bachelor's degree in economics and working on my masters thesis in information technology, i pursued my first data science experience by finishing alot of MOOCS and building a robust personal portfolio with a main aim, which helping businesses doing their jobs more efficiently, intelligently, and robustly by providing predictive and prescriptive analytics using cutting edge technologies.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
